The most powerful ruler of the Khilji dynasty. He assumed the title of Sikandar-i-Sani (The Second Alexander).

Conquests and Diplomacy

He conquered Gujarat, Ranthambore, Chittor, and Malwa. He sent successful expeditions to South India under the command of Malik Kafur.
